## Quiz 1

```{r q1, echo = FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("images/q1_chin.png")
question(" What can you see?",
        answer("Chin", correct = TRUE),
        answer("Belly"),
        answer("Toe"),
        answer("Tummy"), 
        allow_retry = TRUE
        )
```
